content: **crochet drops bag in muskat soft with border and string in ice ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the paint the desert hat pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** diameter approx 19 cm / 7½ height approx 33 cm / 13 **materials** drops muskat soft from garnstudio 250 g colour no 04 rainbow mix and use drops ice from garnstudio 50 g colour no 7 blue drops crochet hook size 3 5mm / us e/4 - or size needed to obtain 20 single_crochet = width 10 cm / 4 drops crochet hook size 5mm /us h/8 for border pattern links us version 2 uk version 3 french version 4 german version 5 finnish version 6 dutch version 7 norwegian version 8 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/107-36-a---paint-the-desert-hat 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/en/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=us 3 http //www garnstudio com/lang/en/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=en 4 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=fr 5 http //www garnstudio com/lang/de/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=de 6 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fi/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=fi 7 http //www garnstudio com/lang/nl/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=nl 8 http //www garnstudio com/lang/no/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=36&lang=no
